actionConfiguration.body:
select  lsd.school_name, sci.std, sm.section, sbm.subject_name,  ms.name, ms.roll_number, td.test_name, concat(cdm.chapter_tag, ' - ',cdm.chapter_name) as chapter_name, 
		concat(tt.score, '/',tt.maximum_marks) as score, (tt.time_taken),
		timezone('Asia/Kolkata',tt.start_time) as start_time, timezone('Asia/Kolkata',tt.submitted_time) as submitted_time, 
		
		 tt.error, tt.status,
		 timezone('Asia/Kolkata',tt.last_updated) as data_fetched_time
		 from app.master_student_data as ms
join app.test_takers_api_data as tt
on ms.ly_learner_id = tt.ly_learner_id

join app.test_status_api_data as ts
on ts.ly_test_id = tt.ly_test_id

join course_test_track as ctt
on ctt.ly_lesson_id = ts.ly_lesson_id

join test_details as td
on td.test_id = ctt.test_id

join chapter_details_master as cdm
on cdm.chapter_tag = td.chapter_tag

join section_master as sm
on sm.section_id = ms.section_id

join school_class_info as sci
on sm.class_id = sci.class_id

join lb_school_details as lsd
on lsd.school_id = sci.school_id

join subject_master as sbm
on sbm.subject_id = cdm.subject_id

where ms.roll_number in ({{student_list.selectedOptionValues.join(",")}}) and tt.start_time::date >= to_timestamp('{{date_slt.selectedDate}}', 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH24:MI:00.000Z')::date

order by ms.name, cdm.chapter_tag, td.test_name
